asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/verilux-reg-smartlight-trade-curve-desk-lamp/3240301?Keyword=smartlight+lamp
From the creators of SmartLight, the ideal study partner, comes the Curve, a SmartLight with a sleek, curved stylish shape that will modernize your study or work space and help you be more productive. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: If you think all light is created equal turn on an energy efficient smart light productivity lamp from Varilux you'll see better, read faster, study longer, and work smarter. Varilux lamps feature natural spectrum illumination, lighting that replicates key wavelengths of natural light. The smart light illuminates with a broad range of light. Stimulating all of the eyes photoreceptors for better visual efficiency while using less energy. Conventional lighting can irritate the eye with glare and cause fatigue. Varilux natural spectrum light relaxes the eye and reduces the size of the pupil for better focus and improved visual performance. The smart light is the result of more than 50 years of lighting research studies show you'll read faster with better comprehension, study longer without eye strain and fatigue and work smarter with greater productivity and focus. At home, in the dorm, or in the office. Varilux smart light is your perfect productivity partner.
